cast.overview: Two neighbours — a persecuted journalist and a resigned housewife — forge a strong bond on the day of Adolf Hitler's historic 1938 visit to Rome.
cast.title: A Special Day

details.biography:
Françoise Berd (born Françoise Bernadette Loranger; March 2, 1923 – August 10, 2001) was a Quebec actress and founder of the theatre company L'Égrégore.

Berd played the role of the caretaker in the film A Special Day (Una Giornata particulare) by Ettore Scola (1977), alongside Sophia Loren and Marcello Mastroianni.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Françoise Berd, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Françoise Berd
